website_summaries.verdict: This roomy on-seat organizer is a solid choice if you want something for yourself, or have smaller kids who struggle to reach hanging backseat organizers.
pros: Designed for front or back seat use
Can easily be carried from the car to the house
Garners praise for its sturdy construction and roomy interior
8 storage compartments make organization a breeze
Seat belt installation is quick and easy
cons: A handful of owners had difficulty getting it to sit straight when fastened

customer_reviews.title: I don't have kids like most reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I've bought probably close to 1000 things on Amazon over the years and never written a review. The fact I'm writing one now show say it all. This thing is legit. The quality is 5 star. The design, functionality, and whatever other categories you can come up with... 5 stars. I got black with red stitching. Matches the red stitched interior of my car perfectly. I has two cupholders,a pocket w/zipper and plenty of room for whatever u got. I don't have kids like most reviewers. It's great for road trips. Throw some snacks, books, tablets, drinks whatever. Just buy it. Buy two. You won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Torin Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Sturdy fabric and stitching. Sides are strong but also give just enough. Several pockets to organize everything.Handles make it very easy to cart in and out. We are in the truck all the time this was exceptional when it came to what I could store in it. And I still had room for more! I'll put some photos as well. I can put 2 side by side in one seat(great for multiple kiddos) 👍🏻Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Swanson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!!! Im not one to usually leave reviews but this has been a must have on our long car rides that I though it was about time!! Exactly what I was looking for and made with high quality materials so I know it will last a long time even with 2 crazy boys! I can fit everything I need from diapers/wipes for both boys, toys, books, sippy cups, bottles and STILL had extra room! And if you're anything like me...our car is always a crazy mess with everyones needs and this has been such a lifesaver to keep our car organized and my sanity! :) Thank you Lusso Gear for making such a great car organizer!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Presson

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, small imperfection
customer_reviews.text: We like this for the back seat between car seats. It's much nicer than "mom can you give me _____" every 5 seconds and digging for toys on the floor. 2 things of caution: 1. Anything you put in here is a projectile in a crash, so just be aware that this is a risk you're taking and 2. When you strap this in using the seat belt, unless it's a lapbelt only, it pulls it sideways and no longer sits straight, which drives me crazy. Made of pretty good quality materials, I was impressed by the durability right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this organizer! It is exactly what I am looking for to keep all those 'things you need' in a vehicle, but do not really have space for in your glove box or console. I can imagine it would be perfect to store children's items in for families or for snacks on long drives. Made very well- very sturdy. I expect this to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: Oddly, I was prompted to write a review more than a month after I had already written a review. This is an OK item. It works. It frays and is medium quality, but that is why you are paying a low price. I was happy with mine. Not sure why my review was taken down, except that it does not fit with the five star propaganda. The bottom line is that if you want a cheap item that works well, and you want it for a cheap price, this is a smart purchase. IDK why my reviews need to be suppressed. I assume lots of people, including myself, will be perfectly happy with "good enough."
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It holds our stuff much better than our previous organizer...we especially love all the room for our water bottles and the different compartments for gum and charging cords and such. One note: the inner mesh pockets are for like small water bottles (16 oz?) or something, so they’re not sewn closed at the bottom – they’re open, to where stuff can slide straight through them into the bin below. Nonetheless, we’re very happy with our purchase and are grateful for Lusso Gear creating this great product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, appears very well made. I just got it today and seat belted it into the front seat of my car. I am a homecare nurse and so work out of my car. My car is my office. On a daily basis my laptop, lunch, water, phone and papers go flying off the front seat onto the floor. I finally decided to do something about it and this organizer seemed to fit the bill. I selected it for its size and great reviews. My laptop fits nicely, as does everything else. I now feel organized. You won't be disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Meema

customer_reviews.title: Happy 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I recently moved from San Diego to Minnesota and packing this organizer full of my 2 year olds stuff made the drive really smooth for her. Since she's two it all eventually ended up on the floor of the car but it kept her occupied through the 4 day drive(though half the credit will go to sing-a-long toys....that the Organizer housed!!) She'd just find more things to play with, a surprise in a box, if you will. It's sturdy, has a strap for buckling it in, it folds up into a tiny square and the folds don't ruin it's structure. I would repurchases this or buy for a friend! *Cat approved*
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Organization
customer_reviews.text: I use this wherever i need it , at home, room to room, or my car. excellent on keeping things readily accessible, and organized. Suggestion ... a removable handle that you can carry this with one hand or over the shoulder ( we do need both hands in most situations ) I use mine this way with an old strap I have already have.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car organizer, holds a lot of items!
customer_reviews.text: Used this organizer on a recent road trip...needed something in the back to keep snacks, travel games, waters, wipes etc...The organizer is large and holds a lot...and fit easily between a booster and carseat. I secured it using the middle seatbeat, but it was still sliding around. I really needed it to be stationary. I ended up putting a little sticky velcro strip on the underside of the organizer to make it more sturdy and not so shifty. I would have prefered a hook or something to latch in. Overall served it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: camille gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Well-Built Lusso Gear Car Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Lusso car Seat Organizer. This product is well-built and exactly the right size for my back seat. I would have liked to have had a method of securing the front as it slides all over the place with only the back secured. I ended up cutting two small holes in the bottom on the front edge and tying it down (with a shoestring) to my console. This works ok, but I worry about the holes tearing - only time will tell. All and all this is a great product, and I recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I drove small cars for years and was in the habit of placing maps, tissues, caps and other small miscellany on the back seat where I could usually reach them without looking. After moving into a larger SUV, my wife and I found that the added leg room in the back seat made our supply stash out of reach. This organizer brings everything to the center and forward so we can grab what we need without removing our seat belts and twisting around. It would have been handy even in our smaller cars. It has held its shape well and seems to be quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gillooly

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product because it is well-made, the materials are easy to clean but sturdy, and it accommodates a variety of items without any issues. We are very pleased with the organizer and would most definitely buy it again. I have nothing negative to say...the shipping was fast, the item was well-packaged, and the organizer was exactly as described. Great product. Please note, we do not use the item for drinking or holding drinks, thus I have not provided a rating for "easy to drink from" in the categories above. It is NOT intended to be a negative reflection. We are using this item on a 12,000 mile trip for 3 months across the United States. Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Blue Water Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Solved my problem!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a product like this for some time to safely store and organize items in the front seat of my car, such as a box of Kleenex, eyeglasses, sunglasses, lip gloss, notepad, pens, gum, cell phone, bottled drinks/snacks, etc. that always seem to fly around in my car as I drive. I wanted something that was easily removable for when the front seat is occupied by a passenger. I ordered black -- the same color as my seat, and it disappears nicely from view by passers by when covered by a black hand towel.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G. Kemper

customer_reviews.title: You need one! Especially if you have kids! Get it... like now:)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product to clean my car up. As a mother of 3 my minivan gets disorganized and tends to look messy really fast! I ordered this organizer and IT IS A GAME CHANGER FOLKS! Not only does it look clean and tidy but it keeps my baby’s toys, snacks, and diapers in place while we roam around handling business. It’s a beautiful design and it’s very well made. I got mine pretty quickly and I highly recommend it! I’ll definitely reorder and I’m actually ordering one for my husbands car as well because it’s just that great.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer for my vehicle. I like to keep a spare hat and gloves in the car, and always have my hard hat, safety glasses, and radio in the vehicle for work. Having this kept all that stuff from being strewn across the back seat looking like a mess. Everything is neat and tidy and can easily be picked up and moved if I've got passengers. It stays put nicely and has plenty of room for all the above plus a bunch of other things. Very happy with the quality and appearance of the materials as well. The red and black matches my leather seats and doesn't look out of place or tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S.

customer_reviews.title: Put it behind your drivers car seat on the floorboard
customer_reviews.text: This will hold the items you need in a car, the ones you need access to quickly, like kleenex, and baby wipes, and the reciepts in a ziplock bag you brought to return things, or the coupons in an envelope, or the small umbrella or sweater for the movies. You know you have stuff sliding around in the car all the time. This corrals the books for the library and all thoses items easily. It will also hold a could of grocery bags or a pot of flowers without throwing them all over when you make a turn. Just easy to use, to fold up, cleans off with a damp cloth and I like mine.
customer_reviews.author: N. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things I've bought where I didn't know if it would make my life better, or worse. I'm glad to report, it is a complete success at improving organization in the car. It's not too big nor too small. Just right. I keep it behind the driver's seat, on the floor, and it fits in that space really well. I'm glad I bought this and use it constantly. It's nice to be able to take all those little things out of the car in one motion when it's time to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dave

customer_reviews.title: SO helpful!
customer_reviews.text: this fits perfect in my backseat between my girls' two front facing graco carseats (we have a 2012 honda pilot if that is needed) - it keeps their books / some water bottles / some various toys organized for our long drives = they can easily reach things, i can help them by finding things faster and handing it to them if needed as well - really helps keep my car free of clutter that just floats and rolls around
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: OK in front seat
customer_reviews.text: I use this to corral a superzoom camera, binoculars, and an iPad in the front seat of my car when I'm driving in areas where I'm likely to see wildlife from the road. There's plenty of room for those items and I can reach them easily. I use the seatbelt to secure it in place, but it still moves side to side no matter whether I secure it through the top loop (rear handle strap) or through the sewn in straps on the back. I do like the way it folds flat when not in use. I can leave in the car or bring it in and place it in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Stratus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, keeps my car organized
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it keeps my car clean and organized. It’s big enough to hold a family-size tissue box, has mesh pockets to hold my large water bottle that doesn’t fit in my cup holders, and I can even fit my purse in it if I need to, or just set it along the side. The only slight drawback is when I used my seatbelt to hold it in my front seat, it felt a little loose, so I bought a flat and wide bungee strap which fits perfectly around my car seat and holds it snugly. The bungee I got is ASIN B01N015BXK if you’re interested.
customer_reviews.author: Kat R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made with strong materials. I got this for my boy so we can haul around his toys and stuff. It work well for toys, games and stuffed animals. I just wish it attached to the seat different than using the middle seat belt. it would be nice if it had clips on the bottom like a car seat has to prevent from having to use a seat belt and to keep the organizer from moving too much. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiee33

customer_reviews.title: Love it and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great. So simple, but really useful to keep things organized in the back seat. The kids are actually keeping all their items properly stowed now that we have this, instead of strewn about. It's easy for them to reach and easy for them to get things in and out. They keep an assortment of books, sketchpads and toys in here. It is secured easily with a seatbelt so it doesn't go anywhere if we have to hit the brakes suddenly. Comes neatly folded, assembles exactly as pictured, does what is described. Would recommend to families!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organizing!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product. It's actually more spacious than I expected and fits perfectly in the backseat between our two car seats (we have a jeep grand cherokee). I haven't tried hooking it up using a seatbelt yet since we only have a shoulder belt and some reviews I read said it could make it sit oddly. However, I haven't had any problems with it sliding around. It fits a lot (toys, dvds, books, etc.). My 2-year old can easily reach in and grab the toys he wants, even while buckled into his car seat. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: You Immediately Want to Fill It With Useful Items!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Much better for organizing and keeping necessary items in the car (tissue paper, flashlight, umbrella, first aid kit, water bottles, etc) than the over-the-back-seat style organizers which tend to break easily or fall down. Also, this case folds up when not in use. Very handy. It is a bit more expensive than similar products, but probably worth it in the end. We’ll see how it wears . . .
customer_reviews.author: IsolaBlue

customer_reviews.title: Functional but beware of the strong scents.
customer_reviews.text: The organizer works. However the quality is questionable. The inner support is made of cardboard so if you get it wet, the thing is tossed. The storage unit is packaged with a very strong car freshener which drove my allergy to overdrive. After airing the unit for a free days to get rid of the air freshener smell, the whole thing still reek of plasticizers. I wouldn't recommend this of you're sensitive to strong scents or have sinus allergy.
customer_reviews.author: kbezer

customer_reviews.title: Mainly perfect with a minor issue
customer_reviews.text: This thing was perfect for what I needed which is a place other than the seat for documents and children's toys. I've had it for a little over two weeks and the inside fabric in the front separated from the seam. I'm going to order a different brand and see if I don't have the same issue. It's unfortunate because this organizer fits perfectly in the middle seat and doesn't slide around when you're driving. Edit 9/20/17: I decided to keep the original organizer because despite the small issue it's a really nice organizer and delivers in all other aspects.
customer_reviews.author: TFBenitez

customer_reviews.title: Great backseat p
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a backseat book organizer and this seem to be the best reviewed. For a good reason as well, this thing is terrific! Really well-made, took it out of the box hooked it to the seatbelt and we were good to go. Highly recommended. Plus there are a couple water bottle holders inside although it’s too full of books to use but that was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O

customer_reviews.title: Great For Food Delivery Drivers!!!
customer_reviews.text: After I had a Resturant employee puts soft drinks in a plastic bag and put it in my car floor, to which no surprise it fell down and spilled all over my car, I had enough. I need something to secure my food packages while doing food deliveries. At first I thought it was too small. But after doing several deliveries I noticed that most food carriers as the exact dimensions of this car organizer. I would recommend they provide a better alternative to using a front passenger seat seat belt. I’ve considered using bungy cords and putting them through the back provided loops.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car organizer!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I applaud the seller. Excellent communication. This company knows how to run a business and value the satisfaction of each of their buyer. The product? Excellent handcraft, excellent quality. It is made to last a lifetime:). Perfect size in my car. With the integrated pockets, wide space, it will surely cater to organize your needs/supplies. Please save your time looking for car organizer. This is the product. This is quality. Thank you for producing good product. Thank you for aiming excellence.
customer_reviews.author: job_RN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organizer for road trips with kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a roadtrip with my two carseat-bound kids and it was a rounding success. I loved being able to buckle it in so it wouldn't slide around and it's the perfect height for them to grab what they want independently. I normally spend the entire trip swapping out their toys because they can't reach very far, so this was a huge pro for me. And even better, I was able to sit the portable DVD player right in the front section on top of their toys, so they were both able to watch. I can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: CTshopper

customer_reviews.title: Best organization tool for anyone who drives a car.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I work out of my car and this has been my assistant, for sure. Stays securely held even if I stop the car quickly. I put my lunch box in the front and laptop in the back. Very spacious. When it's the weekend and I have someone who needs to sit in the seat, I simply use the handles and lift it out. Also, I can fit more stuff between the holder and the seat, such as a purse. Best purchase I've made for my car. I own a sub but I'm sure it would fit any car seat well.
customer_reviews.author: Mayzie67

customer_reviews.title: A road trip must!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car seat organizer for a summer road trip since the backseat of my Jeep Renegade didn't have a middle compartment with cupholders. It was a lifesaver! It holds a lot of items and the cupholders are very steady. The zippered mesh compartment was great for storing the ipad/DS charger cables. The set up takes only a minute and the seatbelt holds it securely to the seat. I had two happy kiddoes the entire trip!
customer_reviews.author: The Rosy Cup

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy materials and perfect fit. Very pleased with this. Just arrived so longevity not yet proven Just what I needed for my work (I spend many hours between jobs in my truck). And bing a bit ocd I needed some way to organize may catch all (passenger seat) I’m very very pleased with the product and the company itself. This was an excellent purchase and I’ll be doing more business with them in the near future Would def reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gers

customer_reviews.title: Not Just a Back Seat Organizer (OR just for kids!)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this organizer! It's sturdy, logical, simple yet thoroughly complete. I travel (via car) for my job and use this organizer in the front seat. It helps keep everything close at hand to easily and quickly pull out what I need for client visits. And my car is now so much less messy in both the front and back seats. The smaller pockets help hold things like my phones (we're hands-free in this state, and my phones and charges also always seemed to be in the way of something--even if it's just the holder interfering with the vent or dash display--but not anymore!) or other smaller items. Very, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: TJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service is excellent, I've added one more star for customer service. I wish there would be more mesh pockets on the sides to give more options for organizing
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buying experience.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a 13 day road trip with a 9 year old and 7 year old in our Mazda 5 which has limited storage options for the backseats. They fit perfectly on the floor in front of the middle seats, and one can fit snuggly between the middle seats as a more useful option than the standard fold-away storage. These held up to messes, kicks, heavy hard cover books, water bottles, etc. And now that the trip is over, I can keep one open in the car and the other folded up under the middle seat. Very happy with service and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for passenger seat storage
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled they make this, my new car came with almost zero storage for the front. The passenger seat belt slides through the back handle and secures this to the seat. When seating a passenger I simply place this in the back seat of the vehicle. It is sturdy with lots of room to carry whatever you need. My other car had 3 full size glove compartments in the front so I was spoiled. This is just right to hold the items that were in the old car plus a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: anadux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect art supplies organizer for the car!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES to color and draw and keeps paper and pencils/markers with her everywhere she goes including in the car. The back of the van where she sits was always a disaster of drawings and colorings on the seat and on the floor, dropped markers etc. Now there’s a spot to keep everything nice and organized and easily accessible for her and best of all I don’t feel like the back half of my van looks like the craft store blew up! I’m even thinking of purchasing a second one to go under my center console in the front to keep other odds and ends organized! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn E

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Organized
customer_reviews.text: This is the product on a Ford Focus passenger seat. I thought it would be wider. But it does appear to be very sturdy and it does give me space to keep organized. I travel for work and I need different types of supplies with me. The things I can keep inside the car, I do to avoid a lot of unpacking and packing. It does feel very sturdy. I’m happy with the quality upon unboxing & packing.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Best organizer I have found
customer_reviews.text: I am a mail carrier and use this in my RHD vehicle to keep my items organized. I use 1 compartment for my outgoing mail and small packages I pick up on the route, the other compartment for mail I need to bring back to the office for different reasons. The front pockets I keep my pens, markers or whatever else I use daily. It is very sturdy and I have not had any issues with it at. It works exactly the way I wanted it to for the job I do.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for people that travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot by car so this is a great little carrier to sit next to me. Holds snacks, chargers, papers etc. I like being able to pick it up and put it in the trunk without having to grab everything up when I need the seat for a person. I'd recommend this for kids or travelers. Super handy for organizing!
customer_reviews.author: Solaurie

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for the car!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backseat car organizer has been wonderful on road trips. I put all of my kids coloring books, games, snacks, and drinks in it and they can find everything easily! Plus I can just pull it out of the car when we get home to clean out instead of having to dig crayons and coloring pages from the floor and between the seats like I used to. It seems pretty strong and durable. I've been able to wipe it clean with a damp cloth whenever it gets a little messy. I highly recommend this if you have kids or just need to keep your stuff organized!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Reed

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: First review: "Way smaller then the seat in your car. I did keep mine but I wouldnt order this one again do to the small size." New review: Thank you for refunding my money and for sending the gift with no hassle on me. You truly know customer service 110% I changed the review from 2 stars to 4 stars. The last star is only because the item itself was smaller then I anticipated. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Front Car Seat Organizer in Minivan makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: The 'Lusso Gear' Car Seat Organizer is perfect for my needs. The large vacant space between the front bucket seats in my minivan have been a challenge for years in trying to keep things in their place without rolling around, etc. Not anymore! Problem solved with the organizer. I use it to hold cell phone electronics/cords, Kleenex, wet naps, extra plastic spoons, forks, straws, napkins, sunglasses/eye glasses, etc. I still have room for more... I wish I had it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: Road Trip Necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those better-than-advertised Amazon surprises. This organizer is perfect. We road trip a lot in our Outback as a retired couple. This organizer sits nicely on the back seat or the floor right behind the driver seat. We put water bottles, snacks, sunglasses, tooth picks, tissues, etc in it. It is solidly constructed and easily folds up into a tiny cube that can be stored in the seat or door pockets when not in use. The handles are handy for carrying it from the car to the hotel room each night.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: NOT machine washable but fine otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This is good but NOT machine washable so it was great until I tried to wash then it came apart so to the trash it went.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best car organizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing organizer! I'm using this a bit differently than intended, and it's working out perfect. I have fitted this in the front seat of my jeep for all of my personal items that I need close at hand. It securely holds my sunglasses, my purse, my water bottle, etc. so that they don't bounce around and roll under the seat. The straps on the back are ideal for holding it tight with the seat belt. If I have a passenger, I can lift the whole thing out and stow it in the back. I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It’s very nifty. Lots of storage and I love that it has straps so you can buckle it in place. I *kind of* wish it had rubber grips on the bottom to prevent the front from sliding. But it doesn’t really slide so I still like the product. I ordered the grey and it’s true to the image.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Finally neat and organized!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I’ve received it and LOVE IT!!! I do home health and live out of my car. God forbid if someone wants to ride with me because clearing out the front seat is (now was) an embarrassment. And finding what I need was always a chore. Now my front seat looks neat and organized with a spot for my water bottle and books and pens and nail file and hand sanitizer and all of the other stuff that I have to have on hand. And when someone wants a ride I just have to lift it out with the two handles and put it in the back.....easy peasy lemon squeezy! Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy j.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like it's advertised!! The colors match the interior of my car. It doesn't take up much room and it makes it easy for my son to access his books and toys. It also has netting on the inside that is perfect for my son to put his cup of snacks. It also has handles, one on each side so I can carry his things all together than making multiple trips. Highly recommend for anyone needing organizers or if you have kids and wanting to keep your car a little less chaotic. I recommend you get one of these!! Thank you guys!! For providing me and my family an exceptional organizer!
customer_reviews.author: NavyLady42

customer_reviews.title: better than a cardboard box
customer_reviews.text: i love this little organizer. my front seat has been my catch all. i didn't really care though because it was just me. lately though i have been having other people ride with me, forcing me to shove everything in the back, then moving it back as needed. purchased this organizer, and guess what, i am actually, sort of, organized. i put box of tissues, my folio pad and other miscellaneous things, in this. when someone rides with me, i just grab the handles and put it in the back seat. ok, so i could have accomplished the same thing with a cardboard box, but this looks a little more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit behind seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect container for all of our extras in the car, especially for our babies books, water, diapers, toys, and miscellany. I hoped that it would fit on the floor behind the passenger seat and it fits perfectly! We drive a Subaru for reference. You don't have to have both compartments open if you don't need that, which we don't at this time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: shana

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I think we all know that most moms leave the house with at least 5 things in hand. Now I have somewhere to put it all near me and not slide around everywhere, my backpack purse fits perfectly in the rear space. The front is reserved for all the other stuff, books to return to the library, snacks, extra water bottles etc. I'm not sure I remember life before this.
customer_reviews.author: JustAMom

customer_reviews.title: This works really well for a 2 kid back seat.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for a 2 kid back seat. We had a random bin from our house but once my oldest moved to a booster he couldn’t buckle the seatbelt with the bin between them. This one is skinny enough that we can have it in between the 2 seats and he can buckle his seatbelt. I also like the compartments to separate things. This is very sturdy and colapses nicely for storing if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in between the car seats to organize toys and board books. I really like that it can hold Sippy cups too. I’m glad all of my kids toys are so easily accessible now instead of always being on the floorboard of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: adriann

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our 2018 crosstrek and it’s *perfect*! Holds lots of toys, stays in place, sized exactly right for between the passenger seats.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I can put it on the passenger ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I can put it on the passenger seat when I’m driving alone or in the middle in the back when I have a full car. I haven’t needed to but there are loops in the back to seat belt it in. It’s sturdy and has nice pockets in addition to the main compartments. I really needed the storage space as my ‘99 BMW has almost none. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: david seymour

customer_reviews.title: ... the backseat of my Jeep and this organizer is perfect! I put it in the center of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of random items cluttering the backseat of my Jeep and this organizer is perfect! I put it in the center of the backseat and I can throw things in there while I'm traveling, and the organizer stays put (I don't have mine buckled in). I don't have kids, but have two CD organizers, glass wipes, a doggy water bottle and bowl, baseball hats and a 1 liter water bottle (which used to roll around the backseat/floor and occasionally leak).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your kid's crap
customer_reviews.text: Just got done with a summer full of road trips. While the kids were never cooperative, this storage solution worked great for keeping "MY" stuff our of "HIS/HER" stuff. People with kids will understand this. Those that have made good life choices (i.e. not had kids) will not.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: this is fantastic! It holds a lot of stuff! We used it on a vacation we recently went on. We we got home some baby food had gotten spilled in it. I was worried it was going to ruin it. But I was able to quickly wipe it up and its good as new.
customer_reviews.author: April D. Bergstresser

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat organizer is SO AMAZING!!! I love it!! It has transformed my backseat to look so clean and organized. There's plenty of room in it for toys, a diaper changing pad/wipes/diapers, and drinks. The seatbelt holds it snugly in place. Also, the customer service through this company is better than any company I have ever shopped. They truly want you to be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TS004

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer for the toys and books I leave in the car for my son. It is very large and extends slightly over the edge of my middle seat. I like that is can be hooked in through the seat belt, but it doesn't quite sit right if I do that in my car. The buckle makes it stick out farther and turn a bit to the side. So I just leave it unbuckled. Overall great for wrangling everything!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Big but good quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this, I was surprised by how big it was. I bought this to put it on my passenger side floor and it fits with only 5 inches to spare. I drive a coupe so don't carry a lot of people in the car so it won't be a problem but for those who do just a fyi. It is made from really good sturdy material, and I use it to store anything that doesn't fit in the glove compartment and center console.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for corralling loose toys and books in the car!
customer_reviews.text: Great for corralling toys and books in the car! I bought this for my 2 year old grandson and all the loose toys and books he always has in the car. The organizer is belted in keeping his items right next to him and within easy reach. It also seems very sturdy and well made and should last a long time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ride

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came 1 day later than supposed to. I am a HVAC Technician and it fits perfectly between driver and passenger seats. I can have my cleaning needs for disinfecting iPad and phone. Store my gloves, my lunch bag will fit in it to. Simple but makes my work vehicle even more organized. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this storage unit. The problem is that it started coming unstitched the first week I had it. This was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Car Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect car organizer! Love the handles for easy movement from the house to the car. The straps in the back keep the organizer secure when the vehicle is in motion. Stored plenty of snacks, DVD's, toys, water bottles etc. for our road trip. Highly recommend this organizer if you are considering purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tapered end. Though most might use it in between some car seats, I bought it for use in the back end of my 2017 highlander. I have a tool box ( about 3 inches tall 12 wide and 17 long in the left corner of the back. This organizer is velcro'd on the top of the toolbox with the tapered end fitting perfectly under the overhang back there. Perfect fit and it holds more than you think!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dourov

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: It holds my stuff in front seat. Now if I have to move my stuff, I just grab the handles and on my way.
customer_reviews.author: The cleaner

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this organizer already. It is just what I was looking for. I don’t put it on the back seat but I put it on the floorboard behind the passenger seat. I have a two-door SUV and it was one of the few organizers I found that was narrow enough to fit in the small space behind the passenger seat. Very pleased with the size and compartments of this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my SUV
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yukon as my work truck, and it has middle row bucket seats. I've had a problem with my gear (hi-vis vests, first aid kit, etc) not being kept in order. I saw this online, and read a ton of positive reviews. I took a (small) chance and bought it. Perfect. The other reviews all talk about keeping their kids' toys and such organized. This does so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Moss

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: nice for the car, good way to organize books and toys, it is hard to reach from the carseat so would be better if there was a way to raise it up about 2". a little pricey for what it is, but we got them on prime day and have one in each car. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT. Only thing is that when you fasten ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. Only thing is that when you fasten the seat belt to it, it doesn't sit nice and straight. Perfect for placing all the things in my car that I "cannot" live without, like a TRASHCAN! Yup, I fitted a medium sized trash can in the back one and miscellaneous items in the front. Nice material and sturdy. HIGHLY RECOMMEND if your passenger seat looks like a hurricane just hit it. :P
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea because I like my car to be organized but it doesn't fit well between my captains seats. I squeezed it in and it will work. It is the same thing as a cube for a storage shelf so it will last as long as it is taken care of. The divider doesn't go all the way down so I didn't like that part.
customer_reviews.author: Str8kuntry

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone on the go
customer_reviews.text: I practically live out of my car when I work and this has helped me clean up my car so much. There are pockets for all of my badges, pens, water bottles, tissues, and everything else I have. Wish I got this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kate YR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love our new car seat organizer! Our daily commute to school/work is at least an hour each way. The organizer has made my drive much less stressful. I filled the back with books and activities for my daughter and the front with snacks that she can now get herself. I used the cup holders to hold a water bottle, wipes, tissues, and her sunglasses. It makes everything easier now that she is able to easily reach what she needs for herself. It also helps both of us keep the car cleaner and we love knowing where things are. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: HHHS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this product. It is exactly what I need to keep my truck organized. I have had many car organizers and not one of them comes close to this. I love that it buckles in, has seperate compartments and has cup holders that will hold my girls small cups. They also have the best customer service around. I highly recommend this product and I am so glad I finally found a solution to all the junk floating around in my truck!
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep my kids organized in the backseat. It is very well made. Materials are durable and there is a lot of space in the two compartments to store things. It is durable enough for two toddlers. The selling feature, for me, was the fact that the seat belt can be woven through to help keep it in place. I'm extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product seems to be what I need. However, what I didn't need was the free air fresheners that they included in the package. I had an allergic reaction to them and had to leave the caddy outside for a day in the sun until the pungent smell that was absorbed by the product dissipated. I wanted to buy a second one but I don't want to deal with that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This car seat organizer is heavy as in not flimsy and very well made. I always have a lot of stuff in my front seat and this holds everything and when someone needs to ride with me I just pick it up and stick it in the back seat. I am very pleased and highly recommend this item. Thank you Lusso Gear for such a great product and thanks to Amazon for carrying good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: graciej

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping my vehicle organized. My son loves to have his toys, books, and whatever else he collects, next to seat and available to him. When my kid is done playing with something, he knows to put it back in the organizer. Game changer for our SUV. Fits in the middle console and hooks up to the seatbelt, so it does not move. Recommended for those with children.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Organizer works great. Perfect for in the back seat of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Organizer works great. Perfect for in the back seat of my Jetta. Organizer is very high quality construction and pockets compartments work well for smaller items to secure. Holds bottles of water to a roll of paper towels Folding umbrella box of kleenex etc. and all the other things you keep in the car when traveling. Handles work great to move it to the trunk or put it between the seats in the mini van. No longer have stuff stuffed in the door compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Kris C

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but if you have leather seats it just moves all around & falls on the floor :( I love the size & shape though. I am trying to figure out a way for it to stay put & may get something that I can stick on the bottom so it doesn't slide. Update - I talked to the Seller (whom is very extremely nice & so easy to work with) & they informed me that you can use the seatbelt to hold the organizer in place & it works! LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M. Saulog

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: So nice to pack it flat when not in use. Then fill it up and carry it to the car. Super convenient and as a bonus separates the sides of the backseat to limit the bickering over who’s on whose side
customer_reviews.author: Sandia

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my Chevy traverse. I like it better than other ones I’ve had in the past for the high-back booster‘s since they sit lower down it’s easier for the kids to reach inside of. Lots of storage!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I put this between both my kids car seats and it’s just what we needed. They can keep everything organized and it’s big enough to fit all out needs. Super easy to put in/take out.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips with kids!
customer_reviews.text: We spend a lot of time traveling with our 2 kids, and these are exactly what we needed! They hold a lot and keep things neat and orderly. I was able to fit the round canister of tissues and hand wipes in the cup holders for the kids to have easy access. The front cup holders work well for sunglasses and tablet chargers. We were able to fit 2 side-by-side between our kids’ booster seats (in the backseat of our F350).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been SO handy. I drive solo most of the time and this holds everything I need (tissues, umbrella, sunglasses, pens, paper pads, water bottle, snacks). It is also very easy to just pick the whole thing up and place it in the back seat if someone else is riding with me.
customer_reviews.author: pyb276

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Out kiddo's carseat only has one small cup holder. We wanted this organizer to not only keep his stuff together on road trips, but also to give him extra space for drinks/snacks. It fits every bill. It's lightweight, strong, and fits perfectly in the center console. We haven't hooked the back up yet, and have had no issues with it sliding around (even through some hard brakes). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer even for second row captain's chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer and fits perfectly between the 2 back seats. I can put all the charging cables and earphones together so they won't grow legs. Plus it's wide enough for a Kleenex box.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of our best purchases as of late. It is in the 2nd row of our Dodge Journey (3 rows) and fits perfectly in the middle of two car seats. It doesn’t take up the entire seat so it isn’t a snug fit, stays in place with a seatbelt and holds a tissue box, water bottles, clipboards (with the storage for coloring pages and crayons), a couple pair of sunglasses, books and more with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bozfam

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Before this organizer, I had a mess of toys and books all over the backseat. I could never find anything. This thing holds soooooo much and makes it so easy to see everything with all the pockets. Perfect timing to keep the backseat organized with my second almost here.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Super Flimsy. I had such high hopes for this guy, but it is one of the sadder oganizational attempts i have tried. Dont waste your money unless you are of reinforcing it with something else or dont mind a flimsy bin.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the littles!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It fits perfectly in the third row of my 2019 Subaru Ascent, right between the two booster seats for my 6 & 7 yos. Stores several books, coloring books, flash cards, colored pencils, sunglasses, chapsticks, snacks, baby wipes, and a few small stuffed animals with room to spare! I secured it to the middle seat seatbelt receiver and another seatbelt receiver with a small bungee just to make sure it won’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new car organizer for the back seat. The one we had was bulky and would slide all over the place. This one is perfect! It is more narrow so it fits between the kids better. Plus, it buckles in the seat so no sliding around! The pockets to hold cups are a little snug, but still gets the job done. Plus, I plan to use on of the compartments with a basket to hold trash! My OCD self loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Singing4God

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was finally able to open my new car organizer. The look of it is appealing, and the make of it seems well made. I love the fact that you can use the seatbelt to keep the box in place on the seat. I think my kids will really enjoy the fact that they can see all of their toys, instead of the bag I had been using to store their toys in the car.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: I like this caddy but it’s not as sturdy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this caddy but it’s not as sturdy on the sides as I was hoping based upon the reviews. Would be nice to have cup holders that aren’t mesh/stretchy. Hard for my kids to slip their bottles in them. Other than that it fits between their seats and holds their stuff so I’m pretty happy!
customer_reviews.author: Buysforbaby

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a long road trip. It was super handy to have. We were able to fit coloring stuff, puzzles, changes of clothes and snacks. I would highly recommend if you like things organized
customer_reviews.author: Krista Meyers

product_meta.title: Premium Front & Backseat Car Organizer | Heavy Duty Back Stitching - 9 Clutter-Free Seat Storage Pockets | Easily Keep Seats & Floors Organized & Clean w/Supply and Toy Organizers for Kids & Adults
feature_bullets: PEACE OF MIND WHILE TRAVELING: Forget the days of messy back seats full of toys, spilled drinks and baby gear. With this smart car or trunk organizer you can tidy the back and front seat of your vehicle in just a few seconds! Keep everything you need inside the foldable container and travel in safety from now on! Your children couldn't be happier and you more relaxed!

MORE COMPARTMENTS MORE STORAGE SPACE: Our storage box was designed with your best in mind! We know how messy it can be when traveling. This storage organizer has 8 different compartments including 2 large main areas, 1 zippered pocket to safely hold the essentials and additional outer pockets, plus 4 built in cup holders for bottles.

ERGONOMIC HANDLES FOR EASY GRIP: We have meticulously designed this car seat organizer to make carrying and portability easy with 2 handles. You can either hold the organizer from the handles or place the seat belt through them for a more security. No more storage boxes sliding around and things falling on the floor. Your vehicle will finally be neat and tidy!

IT WILL HOLD ALL THE THINGS YOU NEED: Visiting friends out of town? Going camping or on a beach excursion with your family? This lightweight and compact organizer is a must! Place inside anything that might seem handy for your trip - cleansing wipes and tissues, drinks or snacks, card games, stuffed animals, nursery books or baby chewing toys. Need more? What about your electronics or books?

GET THIS FAMILY CAR SEAT ORGANIZER RISK FREE: Since the safety of our customers is a top priority, we went the extra mile to use only materials that are PAHS free and meet REACH criteria. Basically, we have crafted this organizer from the safest, odor and chemical free materials available. And for complete peace of mind, backed it with our Lifetime Money Back Guarantee policy!
